title: Password Policy Update
description: A GRC analyst must update the corporate password policy to meet a new compliance framework's requirements (e.g., increasing minimum length).

tasks.description: Review the new compliance framework to identify the specific password requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies the new requirements (e.g., 14-character minimum length).

tasks.description: Draft an updated version of the password policy document reflecting the new requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst creates a clear and accurate updated policy document.

tasks.description: Submit the updated policy for review and approval by the CISO and legal department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst follows the correct procedure for policy approval.
